ModMetaData.name: Gwen's Gone Mental Traits
ModMetaData.author: gwen blanket knight
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds 15 traits that affect how colonists perceive the world around them. This mod is in an early phase. i tested as extensively as I could so bug reports are valued. This mod is made with XML only at the moment. I will post a steam free copy to the ludeon forums when i have a chance. used the buttons from https://opengameart.org/content/gui-buttons-0 as the background for the below images
